results.title: Treatment Patterns of Patients With Pulmonary Hypertension: A Descriptive Study in Colombia.
results.text_hl: ...INTRODUCTION: @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@Pulmonary hypertension@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@PH@@@) is a chronic disease characterized by a progressive rise in pulmonary artery blood pressure.

results.title: A case report of a 37-year-old woman with pulmonary arterial hypertension first presented during her 3rd pregnancy and favourable long-term vasoreactive response
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@Pulmonary hypertension@@@ is diagnosed by ruling out other causes of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@PH@@@.

results.title: A comparison of two long-acting vasoselective calcium antagonists in pulmonary hypertension secondary to COPD.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Both @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Felodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015736 @@@felodipine@@@ ER, given as a single daily oral dose of > or = 2.5 mg, are effective pulmonary vasodilators in @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@COPD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@PH@@@.

results.title: Pulmonary vascular remodelling in hypoxic rats: effects of amlodipine, alone and with perindopril.
results.text_hl: Pulmonary vascular resistance (isolated perfused lungs) was reduced by both treatment regimes but only combination treatment reduced @DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Right_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017380 @@@right ventricular hypertrophy@@@. Thus, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ has anti-remodelling properties in @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@pulmonary hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Jeffery TK, Wanstall JC. Pulmonary vascular remodelling in hypoxic rats: effects of amlodipine, alone and with perindopril. Eur J Pharmacol. 2001 Mar 23;416(1-2):123-31. PMID: 11282121

results.title: Acute hypoxic vasoconstriction in isolated rat small and large pulmonary arteries.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, this study has confirmed that @DISEASE_Hypoxia @DISEASE_MESH:D000860 @@@hypoxia@@@ induces a biphasic contractile response in isolated pulmonary arteries requiring extracellular @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@. Both @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Cromakalim @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019806 @@@levcromakalim@@@ inhibit @DISEASE_Hypoxia_Brain @DISEASE_MESH:D002534 @@@hypoxic pulmonary@@@ vasoconstriction and these agents may be of value in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@pulmonary hypertension@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhang F, Woodmansey PA, Morice AH. Acute hypoxic vasoconstriction in isolated rat small and large pulmonary arteries. Physiol Res. 1995;44(1):7-18. PMID: 8789294
